Data set classesÂ¶

Each dataset class inherits from the BaseData.BaseData class (except for CurveData.CurveData). Some of the functions work with a specific dataset class, which sometimes inherits from PointSet.PointSet, and add more functionality (such as ball tree or the open3D PointCloud object).

The following are the existing dataset classes:

  • BaseData class
  • PointSet class
    • PointSubSet class
  • PointSetOpen3D class
    • PointSubSetOpen3D class
  • BallTreePointSet class
  • RasterData class
  • CurveData class
